about_the_game:
In the doomsday world of zombies, according to the characteristics of soldiers, the changing terrain, and the limited resources, the combination of arms to arrange the formation, create a steel defense line, resist the zombies coming in like a flood, and guard your headquarters. Dozens of soldiers to choose from

Soldier

  • combatant - a combatant good at close combat, holding dagger, skill - absolute dodge
  • Light infantry - cheap medium range gunner, with submachine gun, skill - three rounds
  • Blaster - High-defense close-range shooter with shotgun, skill-penetration
  • Infantry - the most common shooter, holding a rifle, skill - throwing grenades
  • Sniper - long-range shooter, hand-held sniper, skill - head shot
  • Machine gunner - good at fire suppression, holding machine gun, skill - full fire
  • Firethrower - high defense close range killing, holding a firethrower, skill - spray flame
  • Artillery - kill in a long range, shoulder rocket launcher, no skill

Function

  • Medics - heal wounded soldiers around, hold shotguns, skills - rapid treatment
  • Engineers - strengthen the defense of guard soldiers, hold submachine guns, skills - absolute defense
  • Scout - increase the range of soldiers around, hold a rifle, skill - eagle eye

Officer

  • Inspector - Supervise the soldiers around, improve the shooting speed of the soldiers around, skills-supervise
  • Team leader - command surrounding soldiers, improve the damage of surrounding soldiers, skills - tactics

Players themselves

Commander - The player himself can increase the effect range of officers within a certain range. The commander is the avatar of the player in the game. Protect yourself
All soldiers listen,Hold position!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10、11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / GeForce 550 / AMD R7 250 (AMD Radeon HD 7750)
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
